Joshua Topolsky from [[The Verge]] stated "It's one of the best smartphones ever made, and with a couple of minor tweaks (particularly to the camera), it could be the best smartphone ever produced."<ref>Newman, Jared. (2011-11-17) [http://www.pcworld.com/article/244225/galaxy_nexus_reviews_of_course_its_the_best_android.html Galaxy Nexus Reviews: Of Course It's the Best Android]. PCWorld. Joshua Topolsky from [[The Verge]] stated "It's one of the best smartphones ever made, and with a couple of minor tweaks (particularly to the camera), it could be the best smartphone ever produced."<ref>Newman, Jared. (2011-11-17) [http://www.pcworld.com/article/244225/galaxy_nexus_reviews_of_course_its_the_best_android.html Galaxy Nexus Reviews: Of Course It's the Best Android]. PCWorld. Retrieved on 2011-11-21. </ref>
  +   +
Vincent Nguyen, from [[SlashGear]] noted the fast performance of Android 4.0.1, the tight integration between the operating system and the hardware and concluded that "this is the best Android phone around today".<ref>http://www.slashgear.com/galaxy-nexus-review-21196912/</ref>
